#summary VCL Styles plugin for NSIS


= Introduction =

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12733424/Blog/NSIS%20VCL%20Styles/NSIS%20Images/Main.png

The _NSISVCLStyles_ plugin (dll) allow you skin the installers created by <a href="http://nsis.sourceforge.net/Main_Page">NSIS</a> (2.46 and 3.0). The size of the plugin is about 1.6 mb, but when is included (and compressed) in the script only add ~550 Kb to the final installer. 


= Installation =

The installer for the plugin includes 30+ VCL Styles and samples NSIS scripts. To install just follow the installer instructions.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12733424/Blog/NSIS%20VCL%20Styles/NSIS%20Images/Installer/1.png

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12733424/Blog/NSIS%20VCL%20Styles/NSIS%20Images/Installer/2.png

= Sample Script=

  To use the plugin in a NSIS installer you must call the  _LoadVCLStyleA_ function passing the skin name in the _.onInit_ function.


{{{
Function .onInit
  SetOutPath $TEMP
  ;Get the skin file to use
  File /oname=Amakrits.vsf "..\Styles\Amakrits.vsf" 
  ;Load the skin using the LoadVCLStyleA function 
  NSISVCLStyles::LoadVCLStyleA /NOUNLOAD $TEMP\Amakrits.vsf
  ;remove the used skin
  Delete $TEMP\Amakrits.vsf
FunctionEnd

}}}

  To use the plugin in a NSIS Uninstaller you must call the  _LoadVCLStyleA_ function passing the skin name in the _un.onInit_ function.

{{{
Function un.onInit
 SetOutPath $TEMP
 File /oname=Amakrits.vsf "..\Styles\Amakrits.vsf"
 NSISVCLStyles::LoadVCLStyleA /NOUNLOAD $TEMP\Amakrits.vsf
FunctionEnd
}}}

= Installer =

 Download the installer of the plugin from <a href="https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/12733424/Blog/NSIS%20VCL%20Styles/NSISVCLStyles.exe">here</a>. The current version of the plugin is 1.0.0.2
